resources.string: Which vibration do you feel represents high temperature?
Which vibration do you feel represents medium temperature?
Which vibration do you feel represents low temperature?
Which vibration do you feel represents strong wind?
Which vibration do you feel represents moderate wind?
Which vibration do you feel represents light wind?
Which vibration do you feel represents heavy rain?
Which vibration do you feel represents moderate rain?
Which vibration do you feel represents light rain?
Invalid input: you need to match 3 vibrations to 3 levels of the weather condition
Please answer all of the questions above
